item.description:
This Month's Girl's Night:

1. Date: Saturday, September 10th at 5pm

2. Location: Valerie's House in North Waterboro

3. Host: Valerie

4. Theme: End of Summer Garden Party

 

Please pick an item below to bring to the party. Please list what you will be bringing in the comments at the bottom of this page.

1. Iced Tea & Lemonade - Linda

2. Mini Quiche - Rebecca

(You can find premade ones in the frozen aisles of grocery stores if you're not a cook.)

3. Mini Croissants - Donna (please bring an additional item of your choosing to cover your plus 1 as well.)

4. House Salad - Nora

5. Seed packets (So we can share some flowers and have them for the spring!) - Joanna

6. Watermelon, Strawberries, & Grapes - Kathleen

7. Chocolate & Vanilla Caterpillar Cupcakes - Lindsay

http://cococakecupcakes.blogspot.com/2009/0...

8. Sangria - Eva

9. Flower Decorated Sugar Cookies - Adrienne

10. Vegetable Patch (Veggie platter with the vegetables lined up in rows) - Luanne

11. Hamburgers & Buns - Celeste

12. Hot Bogs & Buns - Sarah

13. Condiments - Carol

14. Paper plates, cups, & silverware - Valerie

15. Lollipop Flowers - Gail

16. Grilled Potatoes - Linda

17. Ice Cream - Chocolate, Vanilla, & Strawberry - Lori

18. Ice Cream Toppings - Stacy (Feel free to bring your iced tea as well, I just had multiple people sign up for it way ahead of time! Iced tea was the item of the month!)

19. Your Choice Food Item - Amber - a Dessert (They are all delicious, no matter what she brings!)

20. Your Choice Food Item - Donna (Second item for plus 1)

21. Your Choice Food Item - ANYONE?
item.how_to_find_us: Valerie will be answering the door.
item.name: Girls Night! Theme: End of Summer Garden Party
